text: General question about J/GSoC: How necessary or useful is it to maintain a blog over the course of the development period?

elements.text: General question about J/GSoC: How necessary or useful is it to maintain a blog over the course of the development period?

text: It is highly recommended. A large part of open source development is communication. OS development is not sustainable without users and contributors. And that happens only when you explain what you are doing, and get people excited. So yeah, we'd expect at least 2-3 blog posts over the gsoc period.

elements.text: It is highly recommended. A large part of open source development is communication. OS development is not sustainable without users and contributors.
